House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00013
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE SPECIAL PROTECTION OF CHILDREN IN SITUATIONS OF ARMED CONFLICT AND PROVIDING PENALTIES FOR VIOLATIONS THEREOF
SHORT TITLE : Special Protection Of Children In Situations Of Armed Conflicts Act
ABSTRACT : Provides children in situations of armed conflict, those involved, affected or internally displaced, with special protection from all forms of abuse, violence, neglect, discrimination and other conditions prejudicial to their development.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BELMONTE, FELICIANO JR.
